title: Luo Fu - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Tragedy   Xuanhuan
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Artifacts   Cultivation   Determined Protagonist   Magic   Male Protagonist   Multiple Protagonists   Weak to Strong
author: Innocent   无罪
description:
A world of cultivation, seemingly peaceful. But beneath the surface hides an opportunity with effects lasting hundreds of years into the future.

A wild orphan ignorant of the world fatefully encounters a mysterious practitioner of a generations-old martial art. From the unsuspecting wings of a butterfly, a hurricane accumulates.>
